resources.string: Beauty and the Beast de Colombia

This is a movie that tells the story about a beautiful woman and a bastard beast that falls in love with her. I don\'t what happens them but this text is already long enough. \nOh no, I don\'t think this text be long enough already, so that\'s why I\'m typing again. \nPS: I do know about Lorem Ipsum, I just did\'nt want to use it this time haha.
